name: Create a vendor invoice with discount, without tax, & other charges

steps.name: Given I visit the NYB admin website and log in as a user with create, edit, and view access,
When I navigate to the Inventory module and verified the landing page URL,
When I choose the document type as "Vendor Invoice", select warehouse, and select vendor
When I Enter Vendor Invoice No,
When I add Document Proof For Discount,
When I click add sample product option,
When I add new sample products,
When I enter add new product, add new flavor, add new size weight(New combination),

fullName: Sample Product from New Vendor with Vendor Invoice as Document Type: Create a vendor invoice with discount, without tax, & other charges

labels.name: feature
labels.value: Sample Product from New Vendor with Vendor Invoice as Document Type
